html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-04032025-03-12ECCC
ActCanada Wildlife Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Wildlife Area Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the WILDLIFE AREA REGULATIONS in order to (1) remove 19 units (1,371.5 ha) from the Wildlife Area Regulations and replace them with five consolidated National Wildlife Areas: Great Sandhills, Harris Sandhills, Longspur, Moose Mountain Creek, and Thickwood Hills; and (2) authorize the following activities within the five new National Wildlife Areas: wildlife viewing; hiking; non-commercial berry picking; and sport hunting.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0100 Publication Date: 2025-03-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the WILDLIFE AREA REGULATIONS in order to (1) remove 19 units (1,371.5 ha) from the Wildlife Area Regulations and replace them with five consolidated National Wildlife Areas: Great Sandhills, Harris Sandhills, Longspur, Moose Mountain Creek, and Thickwood Hills; and (2) authorize the following activities within the five new National Wildlife Areas: wildlife viewing; hiking; non-commercial berry picking; and sport hunting.
